title: Man stabbed to death in Jashore
body: A man was stabbed to death at Pagladah village of Nawapara under Jashore Sadar in the district on Saturday. The deceased was Shahid, 35, a resident of the village. According to the police, Shahid got into an altercation with several youths from the same village around 4:30pm at the intersection near Rahman’s shop in front of his house over a previous enmity. At one stage, the argument escalated and the youths stabbed him and injured him critically. Shahid was taken to Jashore Sadar Hospital by his father, where the on-duty doctor at the emergency department declared him dead upon arrival. The victim’s family alleged that Piyas, 22, Alif, 20, Iran, 24, and Riyaz, 25, all residents of the same village, were involved in the killing. Faruq Ahmed, officer-in-charge of Kotwali police, said that the police had launched an investigation and intensified operations to arrest the accused.
